name: m4l-lib
description: A utility library for Max for Live (M4L) operations, providing helpful functions for interacting with Ableton Live's API
author: Philip Meyer

scripts.docs: jsdoc2md --heading-depth 2 --example-lang javascript --no-cache --private lib/m4l-lib.js | node scripts/post-process-docs.js > docs/API.md
scripts.docs:generate: npm run docs:clean && npm run docs
scripts.build: echo "No build step required for M4L library"
